settings.title: Here’s To Butter Lips!
settings.text: A plethora of clean, vegan, and sustainable ingredients make up the secret recipe for Pili Ani’s Moisturizing Pili Lip Butter. Specially churned Pili Butter is combined with our sustainably sourced Pili Oil to achieve a deliciously creamy texture and velvety finish. When applied on a regular basis, your pout will become visibly smoother and plumper. Say goodbye to flaky and cracked lips!
